transcript: if I'm making more than one YouTube video or I'm making more than one tweet after a certain amount of reps you're like okay there's a process that when we do it the right way it tends to follow this the thing we were looking at this morning was like how do we how do we introduce videos that are a little bit more captivating and so we're like okay these are the three steps that all the best videos we did had these three and it started with six things and we kept looking okay well this one didn't have these two well this one didn't have these other two but they all had these three and so then that becomes the framework so a lot of it is actually just looking at the data and so it's about trying to find the common factors rather than trying to find every Factor
